events.name: BME Showcase'17
events.description: BME Showcase is an annual event organized by Biomedical Engineering Industry Alliance. This is a platform for the NUS Biomedical Engineering students to present their final year projects to our industry guests. The event includes poster presentation by the students, grading of the posters, food and wine reception, a talk by our industry guests and distribution of prizes to the winners.
events.location: 6 College Avenue East,  #01-01, University Town,, National University of Singapore, Singapore 138614

events.name: The New Technology Radar is out!
events.description: Join us for session for more insights into the recent release of the latest Technology Radar. The themes in this edition include: Conversational UI and natural language processingIntelligence as a serviceDeveloper experience as the new differentiatorThe rise of platformsPervasive Python Read or download the Tech Radar here
events.location: ThoughtWorks , 18 cross street #11-08 China Sq Central (S)048423, Singapore

events.name: Carousell Level-Up: Applying Scrum for Better Delivery Part 4.
events.description:
Hi there! We’ve had a great series of talks about Scrum at Carousell HQ for the past 3 weeks, and we’re capping it off with an advanced look at Scrum, specifically about Sprint Standups, Reviews, Retrospectives and more. These are great feedback mechanisms to improve your process and deliver value faster, so we’d love for you to come and join us next Tuesday evening. 

This week’s topic: Scrum Fundamentals, Pt 4
Presenters: Jordan Dea-Mattson, Carousell VP of Engineering
Date and time: 9 May 2017, 7pm onwards 
Address: 240 Tanjong Pagar Road, #12-00 Keppel Tower 2, Singapore 088540

So come and join our discussions about closing feedback loops, and the best practices for gathering the necessary data to adapt. If you’re working in engineering, product management, or just in defining and delivering products, you’ll definitely find a lot of beneficial stories and insights to help your own projects. Food and drink will be provided, as well as good company! Hope to see you here next Tuesday!
events.location: Carousell HQ, 240 Tanjong Pagar Rd, #12-00, Keppel Towers 2, Singapore 088540
